p: One of the most important steps in analyzing an invading pathogen for possible vaccine targets is identifying the epitope regions. Accumulated databases of identified epitopes and antigens have established a starting point to determine potential epitopes in new antigenic determinants. The analyses for this exercise have been done using different methodologies including neural networks and QSAR (quantitative structure activity relationships).
